divs: Sighting Detailsi was either 10 or 11 at the time, but i have this vivid memory of going out in my backyard to play with my dog and when i shut the glass door and turned to the lawn i noticed a bright glowing object (size was a little bigger than a basketball)hovering above the fence and following the fence line towards the next house, then it just shot up into the sky and was gone. I struggled with this memory for many years until about 5 years ago i was watching a show on crop circles and they had caught a orb on video, i about fell over because it looked just like what i had seen when i was younger. i do know that back in the late 70s there were a rash of sightings in the suburbs around portland Oregon.
Summary: i watched an orange glowing orb following the fence line in my backyard.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Milwaukie
There were no other sightings in Milwaukie on or around September 21st 1977
